resources.string: *Works only after new router setup. If you already setup your router, it is not necessary to repeat.
SELECT QUANTITY OF ETHERNET PORTS IN YOUR ROUTER

Please, make sure that you have connected the router with default settings.\nConfiguration will be possible with WiFi only.\nWhen the app closes automatically, reconnect to WiFi with the password \"itremedy\", open the app again, enter the new password \"itremedy.online\" and press \"CONNECT\".

ImProvider enables you to control MikroTik routers through controlling router users' speed limits. The users won't be able to connect each other.
How to use:
1. If you are using a Mikrotik router save its configuration using Winbox.
2. Do factory reset and set it up as new.
3. Turn on the router. 
4. Plug the internet cable into the first port. 
5. Connect your phone or tablet with ImProvider to WiFi network 	"MikroTik-*****".

*If your router creates two networks, do not use 	"MikroTik-****A"	 due to WiFi security.

We are not responsible for any harm done by ImProvider.
To delete the app settings on your router do factory reset.

string.name: help_main
string.font: To set up a new router press the button SET UP A NEW ROUTER. \nTo connect the router after setup enter the password \"itremedy.online\" and press the button CONNECT.

resources.string: Some fields are empty or password is not empty.
Check your connection, input data or router settings. An error occurred:
For unlimited speed enter 999\nTo turn the internet off enter 0
